languages.text: "Как так получается, что из всех своих сородичей ты единственн{mf|ый|ая} узнаешь о наших пирах заранее? Обычно вы столь медленны и нерасторопны, что мои собратья успевают покинуть поле боя прежде, чем поспеет подмога. И все же твоим псам раз за разом удается переходить кабалу дорогу..." {n}Ксенос умолкает, явно ожидая ответа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Как так получается, что из всех своих сородичей ты единственн{mf|ый|ая} узнаешь о наших пирах заранее? Обычно вы столь медленны и нерасторопны, что мои собратья успевают покинуть поле боя прежде, чем поспеет подмога. И все же твоим псам раз за разом удается переходить кабалу дорогу..." {n}Ксенос умолкает.{/n} "А теперь ты обнаглел настолько, что смеешь прерывать мою увеселительную прогулку в реальный мир".

languages.text: "How is it that out of all of your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как так получается, что из всех своих сородичей ты единственн{mf|ый|ая} узнаешь о наших пирах заранее? Обычно вы столь медленны и нерасторопны, что мои собратья успевают покинуть поле боя прежде, чем поспеет подмога. И все же твоим псам раз за разом удается переходить кабалу дорогу..." {n}Ксенос умолкает, явно ожидая ответа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "How is it that among all your kind, you are the only one who learns about our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses.{/n} "And now you have grown so brazen as to interrupt my outing into realspace."

"How is it that among all your kind, you are the only one who learns about our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses.{/n} "And now you have grown so brazen as to interrupt my outing into realspace."

Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

"How is it that out of all your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Cómo es posible que de toda tu gente solo tú descubras nuestros festines con antelación? Normalmente sois tan lentos y perezosos que, para cuando llega la ayuda, mi gente ya ha abandonado el campo de batalla. Y, sin embargo, tus sabuesos se han interpuesto una y otra vez en el camino de la Kábala». {n}Hace una pausa para esperar tu respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How is it that out of all of your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo es posible que de toda tu gente solo tú descubras nuestros festines con antelación? Normalmente sois tan lentos y perezosos que, para cuando llega la ayuda, mi gente ya ha abandonado el campo de batalla. Y, sin embargo, tus sabuesos se han interpuesto una y otra vez en el camino de la Kábala». {n}Hace una pausa para esperar tu respuesta.{/n}

languages.text: “为什么在你们所有的同类中，只有你能提前发现我们的盛宴？通常情况下，你们的反应总是慢得可怜，我的族人总是能赶在增援抵达之前离开战场。可你手下的狗，却一次又一次地挡在了阴谋团的面前。”{n}他顿了顿，等待你的答复。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How is it that out of all of your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “为什么在你们所有的同类中，只有你能提前发现我们的盛宴？通常情况下，你们的反应总是慢得可怜，我的族人总是能赶在增援抵达之前离开战场。可你手下的狗，却一次又一次地挡在了阴谋团的面前。”{n}他顿了顿，等待你的答复。{/n}

languages.text: 「なぜお前たちの種族のなかで、お前だけが俺様の饗宴を先に見つけられるのだ？いつものお前らはとてつもなくのろまで、援護が来る前に我が同胞は戦場を離れられる。なのに、これまで何度もお前の犬どもは陰謀団の邪魔をしてきた」{n}彼はこちらの答えを待つかのように話をやめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How is it that out of all of your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なぜお前たちの種族のなかで、お前だけが俺様の饗宴を先に見つけられるのだ？いつものお前らはとてつもなくのろまで、援護が来る前に我がキンは戦場を離れられる。なのに、これまで何度もお前の犬どもは陰謀団の邪魔をしてきた」{n}彼はこちらの答えを待つかのように話をやめた。{/n}

languages.text: "Wie kann es sein, dass von Euresgleichen nur Ihr im Vorfeld von unseren Festmahlen wisst? Üblicherweise seid Ihr alle so langsam und faul, dass die Meinen immer genügend Zeit haben, das Schlachtfeld zu verlassen, bevor Hilfe eintrifft. Aber Eure Hunde stehen der Kabale immer wieder im Weg." {n}Er hält inne und wartet auf deine Antwort.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How is it that out of all of your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

Üblicherweise seid Ihr alle so langsam und faul, dass die Meinen immer genügend Zeit haben, das Schlachtfeld zu verlassen, bevor Hilfe eintrifft. Aber Eure Hunde stehen der Kabale immer wieder im Weg." {n}Er hält inne und wartet auf deine Antwort.{/n}

languages.original_text: "How is it that out of all your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

languages.text: « Comment parvenez-vous à découvrir nos festins à l'avance, chose dont les individus de votre espèce sont généralement incapables ? D'ordinaire, vous êtes tous si lents et mous que les miens ont toujours le temps de quitter le champ de bataille avant l'arrivée de vos renforts, mais vos chiens ont réussi à mettre des bâtons dans les roues de la Kabale plus d'une fois. » {n}Il se tait en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How is it that out of all of your kind, you are the only one to discover our feasts in advance? Usually, you are all so slow and sluggish that my kin always have enough time to leave the battlefield before aid arrives. But still, time and time again, your dogs have been there to stand in the Kabal's way." {n}He pauses, waiting for your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comment parvenez-vous à découvrir nos festins à l'avance, chose dont les individus de votre espèce sont généralement incapables ? D'ordinaire, vous êtes tous si lents et mous que les miens ont toujours le temps de quitter le champ de bataille avant l'arrivée de vos renforts, mais vos chiens ont réussi à mettre des bâtons dans les roues de la Kabale plus d'une fois. » {n}Il se tait en attendant votre réponse.{/n}

languages.text: "Soydaşların arasında nasıl bir tek sen şölenlerimizi önceden keşfedebiliyorsun? Genelde o kadar ağır ve hantalsınız ki destek kuvvetleriniz gelene kadar halkım muharebe meydanını çoktan terk etmiş oluyor. Yine de zaman zaman itlerinizin Kabal'a ayak bağı olduğu da bir gerçek." {n}Yanıt vermeni beklercesine duraksıyor.{/n}
